name: Forum Hungaricum Nonprofit kft.
goal:
Hungarian-based, but European-looking and functioning Hungarian state-owned, public-service organization with more than five hundred employees.
The public employees (500 persons), who take part in the Hungarian National Cultural Digitisation Public Employment Program that is coordinated by the Forum Hungaricum Nonprofit Ltd., mass digitize the cultural heritage objects that are located in different parts of Hungary. They upload digital contents and related descriptive metadata into the cloud-based database of MaNDA. The public employees work for different partner institutes (data providers: presently 91, but 150 including our former partners): mainly public collection institutes, public museums or libraries, archives and other (foundation or religious) collection institutes that provide cultural services or civil and art organisations, local government offices, under the supervision of the particular institute, during 40 hours a week.
Forum Hungaricum has provided Europeana with 198 854 records so far, and 5000 records are being provided monthly on average, partly with English translations. Company emphasize the importance of elaborating the theoretical-methodical frames and rights management of digitisation. Forum Hungaricum’s management is highlighted the PR and promoting activities of the institute: our colleagues compose virtual exhibitions in varied topics from the documents that our partners uploaded in the database, and operate our Facebook page as well.

The general purpose of our company is the widest and most free distribution and access of culture and art in 21. century's world.
interests: Culture, Culture and media, Education and training, European Neighbourhood Policy, Youth
euInitiatives:
We are interested in creating a broader copyright agreement, we are the initiators of this.We have important initiatives in the field of europeana and culture.
we are interested in advancing and expanding common policies, we have agreed and supported the initiative to became Europeana an european Agency.At the same time, we agreed with the intention of creating a dual financing system under the creative europe program.We understand and follow the new kind of IT initiatives that help to make content more accessible.
